ygData.subject: Re: Membership restrictions?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Brent, The EQ_women list is only for women to join and participate in. I will not enforce this rule in any way, because there is no point in trying to
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Brent,

The EQ_women list is only for women to join and participate in.

I will not enforce this rule in any way, because there is no point in
trying to enforce it--anyone can get around it. I don't want to pretend
that this can be enforced, so I won't remove you from the list, or even
ask you to leave, I'll just say that that's the rule.

Digests from the list are publicly readable from www.onelist.com.

- Christina

On Tue, 3 Aug 1999, Brent Schorsch wrote:

> From: Brent Schorsch <schorsch@...>
>
> Greetings, m'ladies.
>
> I recently happened to hear of your gatherings for discussion. I thought
> I might ask if you would welcome a man, such as myself, to participate.
> In my travels of the lands of Norrath, it often seems the women I
> encounter are much more likely to have the wit and intelligence for a
> good conversation. So, ladies, might I participate, or am I invading your
> sanctuary away from us uncouth men? I certainly would not be offended if
> you would prefer that I depart.
>
> I await your decision, ladies.
>
> Iustus
> Knight of the Holy Order of Mithaniel Marr
> Tarrew Marr
>
> [ooc: just let me know and I will remove myself from this list]
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
